timeline.message:
Implement WorldEvent.

This also includes the following nested derived events:
 - WorldEvent.Load
 - WorldEvent.Unload
 - WorldEvent.Save
 - WorldEvent.PotentialSpawns
 - WorldEvent.CreateSpawnPosition
